parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set if leader can issue attack commands to the soldiers in his group.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> group '''enableAttack''' enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Object]] or [[Group]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_group1 '''enableAttack''' [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[attackEnabled]]
</value></part></template>
